A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Apparently\, according to the media\, anyone who doesn't like this film is just "trolling."

So I guess I'm just "trolling" when I say I've loved every single Star Wars movie ever made including even the Clone Wars Carton one that I saw in the theater but not only hated this new one\, but hated it so much that I will likely never see another Star Wars film ever again.

No lightsaber fight. Entire plots thrown out and discarded. Annoying new characters like Rose who are worse than Jar Jar.

Ridiculous plot! And now there is no one left who can pose as a proper main villain. I love Kylo Ren as a character but he's like the Star Wars version of Vegeta.

There is no proper truly evil character left. The entire movie is just crap.
